attributes.title: MAGA
attributes.review: This app was downloaded to try and educate myself on stuff, whatever. But  since I downloaded the app a bunch of my other online accounts have been hacked. I’m pretty sure my info got leaked by the app. Terrible. Now I’m voting for Biden

attributes.title: I also almost died from this terrible app 😞😭
attributes.review: as soon as I downloaded the app, spongebob came through my tv and started to steal all of my bananas 😭😭😭 he kept forcing me to leave a five star review, but I quickly uninstalled the app. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!!!!!😔😔😭😭😩

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch out like crazy. I have no idea why it kept glitching to an Orange I was so confused. I rlly do not recommend I don’t even know why this is on the App Store. Whoever made this is obviously of low intellect.

attributes.title: Monster
attributes.review: He is taking down TikTok and he is racist worst of all he doesn’t let he’s son have any social media, play soccer like he wants to and he can’t have any friends. Trump is just a monster and is a horrible father and husband

attributes.title: Really disappointed.
attributes.review: This app is so bad, really bad quality. I feel like this app is a scam trying to take my money and information. I would never recommend this app, even to my worst enemies.

attributes.title: Wow I used to love trump
attributes.review: But now I see him for what he is. Download this app and see for yourself! He is actually a monster you guys omg. I guess I have to vote for Biden even tho I’m hard core republican normally. Very disappointed in our president. You lost a fan.

attributes.title: THIS IS ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE
attributes.review: trump person came to my house and kick my dog with cancer👿 then proceeds to eat my cat “wet market style” poor thing didn’t have a chance i expected him to be more respectful but i guess that’s just what being a white supremacist does to you

attributes.title: Instructions Unclear
attributes.review: This amazing app told me to put in my phone number. I did that, but then asked me if I like the orange peel that’s in the White House. Well all I can say is the my house is no longer standing and now my arm is stuck in the toilet...

attributes.title: IT TURNED ME ORANGE!!!
attributes.review: Omg as soon as i clicked on the app my skin instantly turned orange like the photo that appeared on my screen of the orange man. it also asked me for my PHONE NUMBER!!! EXCUSE ME?!!! is this how he gets the kids??? unbelievable, worst app i’ve ever downloaded 10/10 would NOT recommend.

attributes.title: Great app!
attributes.review: People just wanna cancel u but no ones gonna stop the trump train! Trump2020
